Need of Maintaining Simplicity 


     "My brethren and sisters at Berrien Springs, you are doing a good work. The Lord is leading you. Just so long as you follow Christ, you will be guided. Maintain your simplicity, and your love for souls, and the Lord will lead you in safe paths. The rich experience you will gain will be of more value to you than gold and silver and 
                                                                           11
precious stones."--Extracts from Unpublished Testimony July 17, 1902.
